snippet.title: Glyphica Typing Survival Trailer (short)
snippet.description:
Glyphica is a typing-roguelike that blends survival and strategy. Type to shoot. Test your keyboard mastery, unlock powerful upgrades, and craft overpowering builds to destroy hordes of enemies.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2400160/Glyphica_Typing_Survival/

Colorful Flowers by Tokyo Music Walker | https://soundcloud.com/user-356546060
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
Creative Commons CC BY 3.0
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
